name: Additional Fitting
effect_text: Careful optimization of power lines and chassis reinforcement allows for adding an additional fitting to the drone.

name: Additional Hardpoint
effect_text: This mod adds one point of Encumbrance to portable drones, though this doesn’t affect their maximum weapon size.

name: Battery Swapping
effect_text: Replacing proprietary battery systems with off-the-shelf models allows man-portable drones to have their battery swapped with a minute of work.

name: Boosted Engine
effect_text: The drone’s engines are tuned to optimize speed, increasing its Move rate by 10m.

name: Heavy Plating
effect_text: Strategic armor reinforcement improves its base AC by 2, but decreases its Move rate by 5m. It also increases its effective Encumbrance by 1 if it’s man-portable.

name: Quick Launch
effect_text: A packed man-portable drone is modified to deploy itself as an On Turn action by its controller instead of a Main Action, even if it’s currently Stowed.

name: Redundant Systems
effect_text: Careful duplication of critical systems increases the drone’s hit points by 25% of its unmodified base score, rounded up. The extra mass increases the Encumbrance of man-portable drones by 1.

name: Stripped Fittings
effect_text: The drone’s maximum fitting total is decreased by 1 and its Encumbrance rating is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 1.
